content: Is there a way to ask in lean for the area of a solution set in R^2 ? I have a set of points which satisfy the shaded area (|x + y| < 8 and x, y have the same sign) and I'd like to state in lean that the area of this is equal to something else. Does anyone know if it's possible? image.png
Not too much, but I'm willing to learn

Well, that is the field that actually formally defines what an "area" is. You might be interested in https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/blob/master/archive/100-theorems-list/9_area_of_a_circle.lean
